idea:
OjasTatva is the passionate endeavor to bring good food to life – the founders have a fervent enthusiasm and a deep yearning to solve barriers to good food –

Access to Nutritious Food - unequal and inconsistent access to food/sources - societies and communities not able to have food of their choice, forced to accept lower quality of the food.

Wastage of Fresh Food – wastage at origin impacts farmer income negatively.

We work with advanced technology and value chain innovations to make this vision come true.

OjasTatva aims to contribute to creating a healthier, happier society and nation by Nourishing Naturally.
name: OJASTATVA LIFE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Problem : Air pollution , Stress full lifestyle, Chemical food , Transfatty acid food are collectively reducing our immunity power make our body prone to number of diseases like Cancer , Heart diseases , blood Pressure , Weight Gain


Solution : Our Body is made of 65-70 % of water and to increase immunity body need to maintain acid-alkaline balance ( alkaline stage , alkaline blood)

Our Brand Tempin Water Generated 7 different types of water ( acidic : external use , neutral : medicine , alkaline : internal body use )
